gridlayout 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Layout Examples
    • Using gridlayout with .Rmds

Layout Examples

layout-examples.Rmd
library(gridlayout)

Basic stack

new_gridlayout("
  |      |         |
  |------|---------|
  |1rem  |1fr      |
  |80px  |header   |
  |1fr   |chickens |
  |1fr   |treePlot |
  |1fr   |yarnPlot |")

Scrolling stack

new_gridlayout("
  |      |           |
  |------|-----------|
  |1rem  |1fr        |
  |80px  |header     |
  |400px |chickPlot  |
  |400px |chickTable |
  |400px |treePlot   |
  |400px |yarnPlot   |",
  container_height = "auto")

2x2 equal grid

new_gridlayout("
  |     |           |         |
  |-----|-----------|---------|
  |1rem |1fr        |1fr      |
  |80px |header     |header   |
  |1fr  |chickPlot  |yarnPlot |
  |1fr  |chickTable |treePlot |
  ")

Focal chart – top

new_gridlayout("
  |     |          |         |
  |-----|----------|---------|
  |1rem |1fr       |1fr      |
  |80px |header    |header   |
  |2fr  |chickens  |chickens |
  |1fr  |treePlot  |yarnPlot |
  ")

Focal chart – side

new_gridlayout("
  |     |         |         |
  |-----|---------|---------|
  |1rem |2fr      |1fr      |
  |80px |header   |header   |
  |1fr  |chickens |treePlot |
  |1fr  |chickens |yarnPlot |
  ")

Contents

gridlayout is built for R Markdown, an ecosystem of packages for creating computational documents in R. Learn more at rmarkdown.rstudio.com.

Developed by Nick Strayer. Site built with pkgdown.
